description: Affordable, great, full of light apartment in New York. Safe and clean neighborhood. 3 min walk from train. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).
name: Charming sunny apt to stay in New York
review:
There were so many good things about our stay here that I will have to break it down.. 
1. The check in was a breeze. I had told Anna that we would be arriving at the unit earlier than the actually check in time, and Anna was kind enough to let us in earlier. Within a matter of minutes we were in. Check out was just as easy.
2. The location is fantastic! Safe and relatively close to the sightseeing areas in Brooklyn (eg. Prospect park, botanical gardens,etc)
3. The unit itself was clean and surprisingly spacious! The decor was beautiful! 
4. The parking is easy and safe. 

My only concern was the shower head. The attachment that holds the shower head up was broken and therefore i had to hold up the shower head with my hands in order to shower. It got the job done but it was a little inconvenient. 

Overall, it was an amazing stay. You definitely get what you pay for!
